content: This PR https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/pull/12173 has been extensively reviewed and amended, and now has an approval. Please would it be possible to have a delegation so BORS can merge it? Thanks.
Okay! I do like Eric's proposed generalisation, but we shouldn't hold up good PRs because they aren't "perfect", and in case it's not at all clear the generalisation would ever be used.
It turns out my generalization was missing some prerequisitese anyway; I've opened #14223 with those.
